title: A S*ave Career Planner Can Be A Successful Profession - Novel Updates

description:
Career Consultant. It was a profession where various consultations were made to aid a person seeking employment.

Mitsuji Toshiki, a young man from modern Japan, had the skills and qualifications to be a career consultant. He was teleported to another world before he knew it and became an apprentice to a slave merchant.

Toshiki was determined to redo his life one more time when he realized that he was teleported to another world.

With the skills to judge and see through a personâ€™s suitable character, he skillfully rose in fame in this other world.

NOTE:
